sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Transaction, FinancialSummary } from '../types/financial'; import { CurrencyDollarIcon, PlusIcon, ArrowTrendingUpIcon, ArrowTrendingDownIcon, BanknotesIcon, ReceiptPercentIcon, ChartBarIcon, DocumentChartBarIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; const Accounting: React.FC = () => { const [transactions, setTransactions] = useState([]); const [summary, setSummary] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [selectedPeriod, setSelectedPeriod] = useState('current_month'); const [selectedView, setSelectedView] = useState<'overview' | 'transactions' | 'reports'>('overview'); useEffect(() => { fetchFinancialData(); }, [selectedPeriod]); const fetchFinancialData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); // TODO: Replace with actual API calls // const [transactionsData, summaryData] = await Promise.all([ // financialService.getTransactions({ period: selectedPeriod }), // financialService.getFinancialSummary({ period: selectedPeriod }) // ]); // Mock data for now setTransactions([]); setSummary({ totalIncome: 0, totalExpenses: 0, netIncome: 0, monthlyIncome: 0, monthlyExpenses: 0, monthlyNetIncome: 0, outstandingRent: 0, overduePayments: 0, incomeByCategory: {}, expensesByCategory: {}, incomeGrowth: 0, expenseGrowth: 0, }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching financial data:', error); toast.error('Failed to load financial data'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; if (loading) { return (
); } return (
{/* Header */}

Accounting & Finance

Track income, expenses, and financial performance

{/* Navigation Tabs */}
{/* Overview Tab */} {selectedView === 'overview' && summary && (
{/* Financial Summary Cards */}
Total Income
${summary.totalIncome.toLocaleString()}
Total Expenses
${summary.totalExpenses.toLocaleString()}
Net Income
= 0 ? 'text-green-600' : 'text-red-600'}`}> ${summary.netIncome.toLocaleString()}
Outstanding
${summary.outstandingRent.toLocaleString()}
{/* Charts and Analytics Placeholder */}

Expense Breakdown

{/* Recent Transactions */}

{transactions.length === 0 ? (

) : (

Date Description Category Amount Status
{new Date(transaction.transactionDate).toLocaleDateString()} {transaction.description} {transaction.category} {transaction.type === 'income' ? '+' : '-'}${transaction.amount.toLocaleString()} {transaction.status}
)}
)} {/* Transactions Tab */} {selectedView === 'transactions' && (

All Transactions

Transaction management coming soon

)} {/* Reports Tab */} {selectedView === 'reports' && (

Financial Reports

Financial reports coming soon

)}
); }; export default Accounting;
